::Inu::
Landing at the CF in the docking bay.

::Koj::
Koj walks down the hallway toward the Storage units and stops out of camera 
range. "Inu give me a boost. As he climbs up Inu's back ok he disconnects 
the camera and sets it on a footage loop((Its playing the same clear hallway 
over and over until some one fixes the loop but since no travels the lower 
levels on screen it would appear normal.))

::Inu::
"Now how are we going to open the storage units."

::Koj::
Trying the codes ?1 gave him "They open the master locks but the secondary 
locks are still holding. I hate doing this legal stuff anyway" A port on his 
arm shoots out a small pellet. Koj grabs the pellet and squeezes it as it 
squirts acid out dissolving the locks.

::Inu::
"Nice move but now its my turn." Inu digs his claws into the door and slides 
it back. "Ok we need Bulk Head screws, A G-Defuse, Metal deposits, Transwarp 
core, plus A cyber crane, defense shield generator, A exo suit, Conduit 
cable, Basic cable, Power cells. Etc

::Koj::
"You check the right half I got the left half load it all into this hovers 
dolly."
